sections.heading: OBLIGATIONS OF PARENTSArt. 224
sections.text: Parental obligation of support and educationParents are obligated to support, maintain, and educate their child. The obligation to educate a child continues after minority as provided by law.Acts 2015, No. 260, ยง1, eff. Jan. 1, 2016.
